titles.title: PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to award grants and carry out other activities to develop alternatives to aqueous film-forming foam, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
This bill requires the National Institute of Standards and Technology to award grants and carry out other activities to promote and advance the research and development of alternatives to aqueous film-forming foam containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances, commonly referred to as PFAS.
